nodes.text: Solo: A Star Wars Story Official Sticker Collection
Solo: A Star Wars Story Official Sticker Collection is a sticker book based on Solo: A Star Wars Story. It was published by The Topps Company, Inc. and released on May 25, 2018.
Discover more about your favorite characters from Solo: A Star Wars Story, as you read and place stickers in this amazing 32-page sticker album. Features 200 stickers from the new film!
